title: Best Friends
lyrics:
21 Contributors
Best Friends Lyrics
[Verse 1: Drake]
I am sincerely yours
I miss those times before
Back rubs when I was sore
Evian to drink so you pour
I can't even walk straight anymore
10 carats hitting off of one ring
Picking up your call off of one ring
I hit twenty million off a slot machine
Buy you and your sister fucking anything

I am not a saint though, by any means
I can tell you some things, I can't tell you everything
They trying to meddle in our circle like a tambourine
I'm heated girl I really walk a fine line
Yeah, I know I'm smart but I'm no Einstein
Gotta see the family more and find time
I've been on top forever baby, time flies
Bet you never met a dog with nine lives
All I really care about is my side
You always got me looking on the bright side
But lately, shit is getting dark on my side
A thug changes, and love changes
And best friends, they become strangers
Now I'm contemplating war with niggas I was cool with
Now the thoughts I kept inside, I really want to do shit
I'm obsessed with doing this shit just to say I done things
Baby these are bad things I'm thinking, these ain't fun things
Capo want to walk a nigga down to prove we run things
Niggas doing their thing but there can only be one king, yeah



[Pre-Chorus: Drake]
A thug changes, and love changes
And best friends, best friends -

[Chorus: Drake]
Even best friends got to end sometimes, yeah
Even best friends got to end sometimes

[Post-Chorus: Drake]
Know I rep the 6, but I'm on 10 more times
Young nigga stressed but I pretend most times
No one else I know would still be in their prime
Show up to a war alone and stand front line, yeah

[Verse 2: Rod Wave]
Uh, catchin' dope sales, avoidin' pain in a two door mustang
Slangin' K's inside that bottom, how you get you a name
Young nigga had it hard trying to make it out of the rain, the rain, the rain, the rain
White tee, blue jeans and a fitted cap
I had lost myself, I'm trying to get me back
I made some mistakes, I'm paranoid, you trying to get me back
I wrote you later baby girl, could you send it back
And now I'm standing on the coach 
, full of them drugs
Like Meech, I might fall in love in this club

Let's play, one night turned into four years
Tell me, all your flaws, all your secrets and fears

Growings up no fun but we can't be forever young
Before I let you go, I stand outside of your window with my radio



[Bridge: Rod Wave]
Outside of your window, outside of your window
Outside of your window with my radio
Cause growing up's no fun -
Outside of your window with my radio

[Pre-Chorus: Rod Wave]
Thug changes, love changes
Best friends, they become strangers
Best friends, they become dangerous

[Chorus: Rod Wave]
Even best friends got to end sometimes, sometimes
Even best friends got to end sometimes
Even best friends got to end sometimes
Even best friends got to -
